_metadata.description: Ledge Area - reorganized from World1 export

rooms.long_description:
You have entered a small room with a with a stone staircase in the center.
The staircase leads downward. You can also exit to the north and west.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.long_description:
The ledge seems to be no more than a few feet wide and runs around a sheer
wall high above an enormous pool of molten rock. The heat here is quite
unbearable. The ledge leads to the east and southwest.
